LanguageData.Shearer.label: shearer
LanguageData.Shearer.description: A station with motion detecting industrial-size shearing clippers. Swiftly and automatically extracts wool from your colony's animals.\n\nKeep it stocked with food to lure the animals in for processing. Drops the produce where the sheared creature is standing.
LanguageData.Milker.label: milker
LanguageData.Milker.description: A station equipped with servo-motorized tubes, which seek out mammary glands to milk your farm animals.\n\nKeep it stocked with food to lure animals in for processing. Drops the produce where the milked creature is standing.
LanguageData.GenericAnimalHarvester.label: generic animal harvester
LanguageData.GenericAnimalHarvester.description: A sophisticated facility boasting a variety of tools to gently extract any kind of animal products, even from the more exotic species.\n\nKeep it stocked with food to lure animals in for processing. Drops the produce where the animal is standing.
LanguageData.PRF_GlitterHarvester.label: spacer animal harvester
LanguageData.PRF_GlitterHarvester.description: This is a advanced animal harvester that can harvest a wide range of products from animals, it has a frontfacing pull zone that can be made larger with powerbooster. and if RimFridge is installed its cooled to keep food from spoiling over time.
An automatic slaughterhouse. Uses cameras and a rudimentary computer to keep track of your animal population, and to keep it within your defined limits.
LanguageData.RecipeDatabase.label: recipe database
LanguageData.RecipeDatabase.description:
The Portable Recipe Database can import recipes from nearby worktables. Afterwards, when reinstalled near assembler(s), it will upload its recipes to them.

Blue cells are import range for the database.

Uploaded recipes and bills will be lost if the database is moved or destroyed.

I wonder what all these other buttons do...
LanguageData.UniversalAssembler.label: assembler
LanguageData.UniversalAssembler.description:
An automatic assembler controlled by a computer. Despite being called an assembler, it's also capable of simpler procedures such as cutting stone blocks, and refinery work.

Downloads recipes from an adjacent recipe database.

White cell is input range, Blue cell are db range, Yellow cell is output
LanguageData.MachineLearningAssembler.label: adaptive assembler
LanguageData.MachineLearningAssembler.description:
An automatic assembler controlled by a primitive AI.

The simple artificial neural network enables it to learn; to be more precise and efficient at individual recipes. Slowly overwrites currently unused recipe algorithms, as it has limited processing and memory capacity.

Downloads recipes from an adjacent recipe database.

White cell is input range, Blue cell are db range, Yellow cell is output
LanguageData.Battery4k.label: 4k battery
LanguageData.Battery4k.description: A battery capable of storing 4000 watt days of power.
LanguageData.Battery10k.label: 10k battery
LanguageData.Battery10k.description: A battery that can store 10000Wd of power.
LanguageData.Battery16k.label: 16k battery
LanguageData.Battery16k.description: A battery capable of storing 16000 watt days of power.
LanguageData.Battery64k.label: 64k battery
LanguageData.Battery64k.description: An efficient waterproof superposed-cell battery capable of storing 64000 watt days of power. Spdskatr Industries is not responsible for any damage caused by short circuits.
LanguageData.Battery100k.label: 100k battery
LanguageData.Battery100k.description: A battery that can store 100000Wd of power. Has 100% efficiency.
LanguageData.Battery256k.label: 256k battery
LanguageData.Battery256k.description: A very efficient waterproof AI-based battery capable of storing 256000 watt days of power. Cannot break down. Also very beautiful. Spdskatr Industries is not responsible for any damage caused by short circuits.
LanguageData.AIResearchBench.label: AI research bench
LanguageData.AIResearchBench.description: A high-tech bench with an AI module installed. Required for tier 2 automation research and is not a replacement for the hi-tech research bench. Requires power.
LanguageData.TableRoboticMachining.label: robotic machining table
LanguageData.TableRoboticMachining.description: A work station for creating parts, frames and more for automation buildings.
LanguageData.SelfCooker.label: industrial cooker
LanguageData.SelfCooker.description:
An assortment of food processing modules which can peel, mince, chop, mix, cook, steam, grill, and bake ingredients into more or less delicious meals and other edible products.

Never ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go! 

 1x speed 
 5cleanliness 
 cook level 10

White cell is input range 
Blue cell are db range.
LanguageData.PRF_SpacerCooker.label: spacer cooker
LanguageData.PRF_SpacerCooker.description:
An assortment of food processing modules which can peel, mince, chop, mix, cook, steam, grill, and bake ingredients into more or less delicious meals and other edible products.

Never ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go! 

 2x speed 
 20cleanliness 
 cook level 20
LanguageData.MeatGrinder.label: meat grinder
LanguageData.MeatGrinder.description: Precise grinder which processes corpses into piles of usable materials: meat, leather, etc.
LanguageData.PRFFermentingBarrel.label: fermenting tank
LanguageData.PRFFermentingBarrel.description: Fully automated fermenting. Self-regulates temperature to maintain the best quality.
LanguageData.SelfPrepper.label: industrial food processor
LanguageData.SelfPrepper.description: A machine designed to boil, grind, or mill raw food resources into ingredients more suitable for cooking and brewing.
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_DroneCultivator.label: Drone Cultivator
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_DroneCultivator.descript: A building that now using Drones. Can autonomously plant and harvest crops in a 11 cell square around it. Will not be affected by any stat modifiers.\n\nWill haul to a storage or stockpile if withing range.
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_CultivatorWithLamp.label: Drone Cultivator (sun lamp)
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_CultivatorWithLamp.descr: A building that now using Drones. Can autonomously plant and harvest crops in a 11 cell square around it. Has a sun lamp. Will not be affected by any stat modifiers.\n\nWill haul to a storage or stockpile if withing range.
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_b18CultivatorSun.label: Mechanites Cultivator (sun lamp)
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_b18CultivatorSun.descrip: This is a hightech Cultivator that houses worker mechanites, that will sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It has a Full spectrum LED sun light build in its sides. it will also output onto a cell for further processing./nIt has a size of 11x11
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_b18Cultivator.label: Mechanites Cultivator
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_b18Cultivator.descriptio: This is a hightech Cultivator that houses worker mechanites, that will sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It will also output onto a cell for further processing./nIt has a size of 11x11
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_b18CultivatorXL.label: Mechanites XL Cultivator
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_b18CultivatorXL.descript: This is a hightech XL Cultivator that houses worker mechanites, that will sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It will also output onto a cell for further processing./nIt has a size of 23x23 and usses 4x more power and cost, but same speed as a normal size one.\nCapable of holding a roof
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_Sprinkler.label: Sprinkler
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_Sprinkler.description: A building that waters plants in an expanding radius, increasing their growth by one hour per round. Effects are stackable, Work during growtime only
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelper.label: Mini Workshop helper station
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelper.description: A mini workshop helper capable of haul, flick, firefight and clean your workshop within a range(can be expanded with powerslider)
LanguageData.PRF_MiniDroneColumn.label: drone column(throneroom)
LanguageData.PRF_MiniDroneColumn.description: A column filled with 2 handy drones that can clean your throneroom, kill fires, refuel your braziers and move your stuff away from the floor. It's also capable of holding a roof, and looks quite nice.
LanguageData.PRF_StoneWorks.label: Industrial Stoneworks
LanguageData.PRF_StoneWorks.description: A CNC router like automated machine that are capable of turning stone into bricks and even abit mid skilled art too. \nArt level: 10
LanguageData.PRF_Recycler.label: Smart Recycler
LanguageData.PRF_Recycler.description: A recycler that turns almost any apparel and weapons into usable resources, at the cost of some lost materials.
LanguageData.PRF_MetalRefinery.label: Metal Refinery
LanguageData.PRF_MetalRefinery.description: A metal refinery able to produce rare metals through polymer lamination
LanguageData.PRF_PartAssembler.label: Part Assembler
LanguageData.PRF_PartAssembler.description: This is a preset assembler that create parts for further production like components, prf parts and more.
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceI.label: Blast Furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceI.description:
A simple early stage Furnace with minimal automation. Burns unwanted apparel and smelts raw rescourses into useful materials.

Automatically takes input materials (or trash) within the white cells surrounding the furnace - it has an input range of one cell - and outputs(yellow cell) any finished metals into a cell you may specify.
(remember to remove quicly so it dont clog up)
 Use wood to smelt
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceII.label: industrial Furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceII.description: This Second Furnace is an advanced industrial Furnace capable of burning items and smelting raw resources into useful materials\nUses electricity to reduce wood amount for burning
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceIII.label: Electric Furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceIII.description:
Advanced Furnace capable of burning stuff and smelting raw resources into useful materials, faster than previous iterations.

(This furnace is the best and fastest in Project RimFactory.)

Imports any recipe from the Electric Smelter and the Crematorium.
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkI.label: Auger drill(T1)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkI.description: An early automated quarry that continuously extracts resources from the ground, including rock chunks, materials and components. Produces a random resource roughly once every 8 hours.(can cause Infestation!)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry.label: Pulse Drill(T2)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry.description: An automated quarry that continuously extracts resources from the ground, including rock chunks, materials and components. Produces a random resource roughly once every 3 hours.(can cause infestation)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkIII.label: Random Pulse Drill(T3)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkIII.description: This is last tier random ore mining quarry, this one will not create infestation and will only mine rare ores no stones.
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_Miner.label: Plasma Drill(T3)
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_Miner.descripti: With newest Spacer Technology auto mining have been more precise then ever, and can now adjust what ores to mine for and even balance power for speed. It will set primary ore type and get bonus in rare ores and junk
LanguageData.PRF_WallLight.label: Wall Lamp
LanguageData.PRF_WallLight.description:
An electrical wall lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.

These lamps are unlike other wall lamps, multisided and atlased to fit different walls
 Good for small rooms or other tight packed rooms
Also capable of changeing color when placed if colored light are researched

This is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.PRF_SunWallLight.label: Sun Wall Lamp
LanguageData.PRF_SunWallLight.description: An industrial wall lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.\n\nThis is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.PRF_IndustrialLamp.label: Industrial Lamp
LanguageData.PRF_IndustrialLamp.description:
An electrical lamp that lights an area.
This lamp are capable to light up a huge aread both indoor and outdoor to light up your factory hall.
Also capable of changeing color when placed if colored light are researched

This is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.PRF_FloorSpotlight.label: Floor Spotlight
LanguageData.PRF_FloorSpotlight.description:
An electrical lamp that lights an area.
This lamp are capable to be used in and outdoor.
Also capable of changeing color when placed if colored light are researched

This is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.WDMineableCoal.label: coal
LanguageData.WDMineableCoal.description: Coal is a combustible black or brownish-black sedimentary rock, formed as rock strata called coal seams.
LanguageData.StockpileCrateSmall.label: small wooden crate
LanguageData.StockpileCrateSmall.description: (Tier 1 crate) A small crate that can store 16 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.StockpileCrate.label: wooden crate
LanguageData.StockpileCrate.description: A giant crate that can store 32 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.StockpileCrateReinforcedTiny.label: small steel crate
LanguageData.StockpileCrateReinforcedTiny.description: A small steel crate that can store 64 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.StockpileCrateReinforced.label: steel crate
LanguageData.StockpileCrateReinforced.description: A giant crate that can store 128 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.PRFCargoPlatform.label: digital storage unit
LanguageData.PRFCargoPlatform.description: Stores up to 768 stacks. Consumes 10 W of power per stack of items. When your colony loses power, items already inside will be safe, but the building will not be able to store more.
LanguageData.PRFStorageUnitIOPort.label: I/O Port
LanguageData.PRFStorageUnitIOPort.description: (tier 3) \n A Connection port for your storage Cargo Platforms. It can be set to Input/output from any Platform remotely in any range within the map.
LanguageData.FuelingMachine.label: fueling machine
LanguageData.FuelingMachine.description:
A robotic arm built on a simple machine frame that can automatically fuel the building in front of it (the yellow cell points to the "front").

(Works with "Refualable comp" buildings)
And also mortars
LanguageData.SAL_SmartHopper.label: Vacuum Hopper
LanguageData.SAL_SmartHopper.description: A Vacuum Hopper that sucks in any items on stockpiles within a 5-tile range. As long as items are in range, they can be pulled in, even from different stockpiles. Can be set up with a specific amount and type of item, and holds onto the item until it is pulled away.
(PRF) A Puller that pulls foodstuffs from growzones and places them into storage or onto a belt.
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_Puller.label: Item Puller
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_Puller.descript: (PRF) A Puller That Pull items from A to B. Place it down and switch it on to start pulling from stockpiles, I/O, belts, crates Into I/O, belts, storage... Very flexible in its connection!\n\nREMEMBER to turn it on after placing!
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_Puller_Side.des: (PRF) A 90 degree angled Puller that moves items from A to B. Similar to the basic puller, but allowing turns! You can swap the direction (left/right) after placing.\n\nREMEMBER to turn it on after placing!
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_Puller_Wall.des:
(PRF) An in-wall item Puller that pushes items from A to B.

This one is placed through a wall, and is well insulated enough for use in freezers and secure enough for prisons where you dont want anyone crawling through.

Remember you still need to turn it on!
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_BeltConveyor.de: A conveyor belt that can move items from A to B. Point the arrows in the direction you want to it carry things and then place items on top!\n\nConveyor belts can automatically handle turning and even branching if you want that, and will dump into Storage or stockpiles (or just leave stuff on the ground when the belts end).
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_BeltConveyor_Wa: Moves items - through walls! You can use these to traverse walls or move items along inside them. When items hit the end, they will move out onto the ground.
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_BeltConveyor_Un: Underground Conveyor Belts carry items in tunnels under the ground. To move items into the subterrainian passages, you need to use the Underground Conveyor Entrance and Exit.
LanguageData.Building_AutoMachineTool_BeltConveyor_To: Connects ground conveyor belts to underground conveyors. This is the entrance to the subterrainian passages.
Connects the underground conveyor belt to the above-ground conveyor. This is an exit back to the surface, and will drop items on the floor if there is no conveyor.
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorLampArrow.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorLampArrow.label: Yellow Floor Sign Arrow
LanguageData.Lighting_RedFloorLampArrow.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.Lighting_RedFloorLampArrow.label: Red Floor Sign Arrow
LanguageData.Lighting_GreenFloorLampArrow.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.Lighting_GreenFloorLampArrow.label: Green Floor Sign Arrow
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorLampX.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorLampX.label: Red Floor Sign X
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorInput.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorInput.label: Input Sign
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorOutput.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.Lighting_FloorOutput.label: Output Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconClothes.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconClothes.label: Clothes Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconSkull.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconSkull.label: Skull Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconToxic.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconToxic.label: Toxic Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconPower.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconPower.label: Power Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGears.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGears.label: Gears Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGun.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGun.label: Gun Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGasmask.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGasmask.label: Gasmask Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconFire.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconFire.label: Heat Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconCold.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconCold.label: Cold Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconDanger.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconDanger.label: danger Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconExit.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconExit.label: exit Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconPrison.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconPrison.label: Prison Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconResearch.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconResearch.label: Research Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconHospital.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconHospital.label: Hospital Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconBarbedWire.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconBarbedWire.label: BarbedWire Sign
LanguageData.WDCoal.label: coal
LanguageData.WDCoal.description: Coal is a fossil fuel and is the altered remains of prehistoric vegetation that originally accumulated in swamps and peat bogs.
LanguageData.PRFRoboticArm.label: robotic arm
LanguageData.PRFRoboticArm.description: A robotic arm powered by an electric motor. Used in the construction of some automation buildings.
LanguageData.PRFWeakAIChip.label: weak AI chip
LanguageData.PRFWeakAIChip.description: A tensor processing unit containing the most rudimentary AI.
LanguageData.PRFDroneModule.label: drone module
LanguageData.PRFDroneModule.description: A dormant quadcopter frame capable of low-altitude flight.
LanguageData.RimFactory_Data_Disk.label: recipe data disk
LanguageData.RimFactory_Data_Disk.description: A roll of magnetic tape. Apparently it can hold 64 megabytes. How primitive... Its used to create Recipe DataBases(project rimfactory)
LanguageData.PRFMachineFrameSmall.label: simple machine frame
LanguageData.PRFMachineFrameSmall.description: The empty shell of a small automation building.
LanguageData.PRFMachineFrame.label: machine frame
LanguageData.PRFMachineFrame.description: The empty shell of a medium-sized automation building.
LanguageData.PRFMachineFrameLarge.label: adv. machine frame
LanguageData.PRFMachineFrameLarge.description: The empty shell of a advanced automation building.
LanguageData.PRFDrone.label: drone
LanguageData.PRFDrone.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.PRFStorageUnitIOPortFridge.label: I/O Fridge Port
LanguageData.PRFStorageUnitIOPortFridge.description: (tier 3) \n A Connection port for your DeepStorageUnit. It can be set to Input/output from any DSU remotely in any range within the map. This one also have same option as Rimfidge Coolers.
LanguageData.PRFCoolDSU.label: cooled digital storage unit
LanguageData.PRFCoolDSU.description:
Fridge version of Digital Storage Unit, that can store food

Stores up to 512 stacks. Consumes 10 W of power per stack of items. When your colony loses power, items already inside will be safe, but the building will not be able to store more.

This is only available because RimFridge is installed.
